name: Applewood (itch)
description:
Applewood is a tale of apples and redemption.

You play as Henry, a lone colonist on the fertile planet of Applewood.

While Applewood may begin as a mostly vacant fertile planet, with a bit of hard work you can help transform Applewood into a thriving export hub of fruits, vegetables and resources.

How to Play

Left Arrow / A (Walk Left)
Right Arrow / D (Walk Right)
Mouse Wheel (Shake Tree)
Left Mouse (Use/Accept)
